  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PermissionUser
extends PermissionObject<MongoPermissionUser>
    PermissionObject to handle permission-user data and operations for the Permissions Module.
    Author:
    Jab

      • isAdministrator

        public boolean isAdministrator()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player being represented by the PermissionUser is an administrator.

      • getPermissionGroup

        public PermissionGroup getPermissionGroup()
        Returns:
        Returns the PermissionGroup the user is assigned to, if any. If the user is not assigned to a group, null is returned.

      • setPermissionGroup

        public void setPermissionGroup(PermissionGroup permissionGroup,
                               boolean save)
        Sets the PermissionGroup that the PermissionUser is assigned to. To set the PermissionUser to not have an assigned PermissionGroup, use null.

        (Note: If the PermissionUser does not have a PermissionGroup assigned, the PermissionUser will refer to the default PermissionGroup in the Permissions Module.

        Parameters:
        permissionGroup - The PermissionGroup to set.
        save - The flag to save the document.

      • setTemporaryPermissionGroup

        public void setTemporaryPermissionGroup(PermissionGroup permissionGroup)

      • getUniqueId

        public java.util.UUID getUniqueId()
        Returns:
        Returns the Unique ID identifier associated with the PermissionUsers Player.

      • getGroupId

        public java.util.UUID getGroupId()
        Returns:
        Returns the Unique ID identifier associated with the PermissionUsers PermissionGroup.

      • hasPermissionGroup

        public boolean hasPermissionGroup()
        Returns:
        Returns true if the PermissionUser is assigned to a PermissionGroup.
